details.title: Corrections to "Near field coupling in passive and active teraHertz metamaterial devices" [Nov 13 783-790]
details.abstract: In the above-named work [ibid, vol. 3, no. 6, pp. 783-790, Nov. 2013], the mention of a funding agency was inadvertently omitted in the Acknowledgment. The omitted text in the Acknowledgement section [1, p. 788] is provided here.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
details.sponsor: IEEE Microwave Theory and Techniques Society
